participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys building things and values deep connections.
participant_1.background: My most difficult decision was to leave my family behind when I moved away to college. I don’t like to eat meat. I work on a project at my day job, then go home and build something with my hands. I own a dog who is my best friend. I play the drums.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: Energetic and family-oriented, enjoys staying active while cherishing precious moments with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I am grateful for my family, and I enjoy spending time with them on holidays. I will do laundry and spend time with my family. I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike. I am a grandparent at 44. I love to feel the warm sun on my skin and the salty sea air in my hair.

content.text: Not much! About to go lift weights at the gym! How about you?
I'm just having a relaxing day. I'm a bit of a homebody.
Oh nice! I love being active but I also love to relax at home.
What kind of things do you like to do to relax?
I usually spend time with my dog, read, or watch tv.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever! He's the best dog ever.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love dogs.
Me too! They're the best pets.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to go to the beach. I love the feel of the warm sun on my skin and the salty sea air in my hair.
That sounds amazing. I love the beach too.
Have you ever been to the beach in San Diego?
No, I haven't. But I've heard it's beautiful.
It is! It's one of my favorite places in the world.
I'll have to add it to my list of places to visit.
